00010 from GeneralForcefield import GeneralForcefield
00011 from pyre.components.Component import Component
00012 from MMTK.ForceFields import LennardJonesForceField as LennardJonesFF
00013 
00014 class LennardJonesForcefield(GeneralForcefield):
00015     '''Represents the Lennard Jones set of potential options from MMTK'''
00016 
00017     def __init__(self, name='LennardJonesForcefield'):
00018         Component.__init__(self, name, facility='facility')
00019         self.ii=self.inventory
00020 
00021     def getForcefield(self):
00022         '''returns the correct mmtk forcefield object'''
00023         #set default values
00024         ljCutoff=self.ii.ljCutoff
00025         if self.ii.ljCutoff=='None (minimum image convention for periodic systems)':
00026             ljCutoff=None
00027         return LennardJonesFF(ljCutoff)
00028         
00029     def _defaults(self):
00030         Component._defaults(self)
00031         return
00032 
00033     def _configure(self):
00034         Component._configure(self)
00035         return
00036 
00037     def _init(self):
00038         Component._init(self)
00039         return
